info.description: This is the API definition for Ideogram AI.
info.title: Ideogram - OpenAPI 3.0

tags.description: All things related to generating content.
tags.name: generate

tags.description: Content related to managing API account and API access
tags.name: manage

tags.description: Operations related to understanding visual content
tags.name: vision

schema.description: An image binary; only JPEG, WEBPs and PNGs are supported at this time
The response for a describe request encapsulates a list of descriptions

descriptions.text: A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.

A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.

descriptions.description: A collection of descriptions for given content

example.text: A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.

text.description: The generated description for the provided image.
text.example: A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.
text.title: text

descriptions.title: descriptions

schema.title: DescribeResponse

example.error: Image provided failed safety check due to the inclusion of prohibited content.

error.example: Image provided failed safety check due to the inclusion of prohibited content.
error.title: error

image_request.prompt: A serene tropical beach scene. Dominating the foreground are tall palm trees with lush green leaves, standing tall against a backdrop of a sandy beach. The beach leads to the azure waters of the sea, which gently kisses the shoreline. In the distance, there is an island or landmass with a silhouette of what appears to be a lighthouse or tower. The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

example.prompt: A serene tropical beach scene. Dominating the foreground are tall palm trees with lush green leaves, standing tall against a backdrop of a sandy beach. The beach leads to the azure waters of the sea, which gently kisses the shoreline. In the distance, there is an island or landmass with a silhouette of what appears to be a lighthouse or tower. The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

prompt.description: The prompt to use to generate the image.
prompt.example: A serene tropical beach scene. Dominating the foreground are tall palm trees with lush green leaves, standing tall against a backdrop of a sandy beach. The beach leads to the azure waters of the sea, which gently kisses the shoreline. In the distance, there is an island or landmass with a silhouette of what appears to be a lighthouse or tower. The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

aspect_ratio.description: (Cannot be used in conjunction with resolution) The aspect ratio to use for image generation, which determines the image's resolution. Defaults to ASPECT_1_1.
aspect_ratio.title: AspectRatio

model.description: The model used to generate. Defaults to V_2.
model.title: ModelEnum

magic_prompt_option.description: Determine if MagicPrompt should be used in generating the request or not
magic_prompt_option.title: MagicPromptOption

style_type.description: The style type to generate with; this is only applicable for models V_2 and above and should not be specified for model versions V_1.
style_type.title: StyleType

negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from an image. Descriptions in the prompt take precedence to descriptions in the negative prompt.

resolution.description: (For model_version for 2.0 only, cannot be used in conjunction with aspect_ratio) The resolution to use for image generation, represented in width x height. If not specified, defaults to using aspect_ratio.
resolution.title: Resolution

requestBody.description: A request to generate an image with Ideogram.

The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

post.summary: Generates images synchronously based on a given prompt and optional parameters.

current_api_keys.description: The current API keys that are active. Only returns redacted keys.

items.description: A representation of an API key that does not contain the full key.

redacted_api_key.description: A redacted text snippet of the API key. Contains the first 4 characters of the API key
redacted_api_key.title: redacted_api_key

creation_time.description: The time at which the key was created
creation_time.title: creation_time

api_key_id.description: A URL safe base64 encoded UUID
api_key_id.title: api_key_id

items.title: RedactedApiKey

current_api_keys.title: current_api_keys

200.description: API keys the user currently manages

get.summary: Retrieve current API keys and their respective data.

api_key.description: The API key to use when making authenticated requests with the API. This key will only be shown once.
api_key.title: api_key

api_key_id.description: The ID of the API key. A URL safe base64 encoded UUID
api_key_id.title: api_key_id

402.description: Payment is required; did you create a subscription?

parameters.description: The ID of API key to operate on. Expected to be a URL safe Base64 encoded UUID.
parameters.name: api_key_id

parameters.description: Whether the subscription is intended to be used for business or personal use.
parameters.name: isBusiness

stripe_subscription_url.description: The URL for the user to checkout the Stripe subscription plan.
stripe_subscription_url.title: stripe_subscription_url

stripe_billing_url.description: DEPRECATED. The URL for the user to manage the existing Stripe subscription plan. Get this from ManageApiSubscriptionResponse instead.
stripe_billing_url.title: stripe_billing_url

200.description: API subscription content related to connecting to Stripe

get.summary: Retrieve data relevant to connecting to Stripe.

has_accepted_terms.description: Whether or not the latest required terms have been accepted.
has_accepted_terms.title: has_accepted_terms

has_stripe_setup.description: Whether or not Stripe is setup for API usage.
has_stripe_setup.title: has_stripe_setup

metronome_dashboard_url.description: The URL to display the customer usage dashboard.
metronome_dashboard_url.title: metronome_dashboard_url

metronome_dashboard_dark_mode_url.description: The URL to display the customer usage dashboard, in dark mode.
metronome_dashboard_dark_mode_url.title: metronome_dashboard_dark_mode_url

recharge_settings.description: The current recharge settings for the API subscription.

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for the price object.
currency_code.title: currency_code

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the common denomination. For example, in USD this is cents.
amount.title: amount

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the common denomination. For example, in USD this is cents.

stripe_billing_url.description: The URL for the user to manage the existing Stripe subscription plan.
stripe_billing_url.title: stripe_billing_url

schema.description: Request to update API settings. Fields which are omitted will be ignored.

recharge_settings.description: The current recharge settings for the API subscription.

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for the price object.
currency_code.title: currency_code

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the common denomination. For example, in USD this is cents.

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the common denomination. For example, in USD this is cents.
amount.title: amount

schema.title: PostApiSubscriptionRequest

requestBody.description: A request to update the API subscription properties. This should only be called after terms have been accepted.

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for the price object.
currency_code.title: currency_code

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the common denomination. For example, in USD this is cents.

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for the price object.

amount.description: The amount of the currency in the common denomination. For example, in USD this is cents.

recharge_settings.title: RechargeSettings

schema.description: Represents an error when attempting to update the API subscription.

messages.description: Error messages about what the error could be.

items.description: An error message, indicating what went wrong.

messages.title: messages

schema.title: PostApiSubscriptionError

terms_url.description: The URL where the terms are hosted.
terms_url.title: terms_url

get.summary: Retrieve the latest terms of service for API usage.

terms_id.description: The ID of the terms which are being accepted.
terms_id.title: terms_id

requestBody.description: A request to accept the API terms.

schema.description: A request to generate an image from a source image and a provided caption, provided images are cropped to match the chosen output aspect ratio

example.prompt: A serene tropical beach scene. Dominating the foreground are tall palm trees with lush green leaves, standing tall against a backdrop of a sandy beach. The beach leads to the azure waters of the sea, which gently kisses the shoreline. In the distance, there is an island or landmass with a silhouette of what appears to be a lighthouse or tower. The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

image_request.description: A request to generate a new image using a provided image and a prompt.

The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

DescribeResponse.description: The response for a describe request encapsulates a list of descriptions

descriptions.text: A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.

prompt.example: A serene tropical beach scene. Dominating the foreground are tall palm trees with lush green leaves, standing tall against a backdrop of a sandy beach. The beach leads to the azure waters of the sea, which gently kisses the shoreline. In the distance, there is an island or landmass with a silhouette of what appears to be a lighthouse or tower. The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

aspect_ratio.description: (Cannot be used in conjunction with resolution) The aspect ratio to use for image generation, which determines the image's resolution. Defaults to ASPECT_1_1.
aspect_ratio.title: AspectRatio

model.description: The model used to generate. Defaults to V_2.
model.title: ModelEnum

magic_prompt_option.description: Determine if MagicPrompt should be used in generating the request or not
magic_prompt_option.title: MagicPromptOption

style_type.description: The style type to generate with; this is only applicable for models V_2 and above and should not be specified for model versions V_1.
style_type.title: StyleType

negative_prompt.description: Description of what to exclude from an image. Descriptions in the prompt take precedence to descriptions in the negative prompt.

resolution.description: (For model_version for 2.0 only, cannot be used in conjunction with aspect_ratio) The resolution to use for image generation, represented in width x height. If not specified, defaults to using aspect_ratio.
resolution.title: Resolution

The sky above is painted with fluffy white clouds, some of which are tinged with hues of pink and orange, suggesting either a sunrise or sunset.

example.text: A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.

text.description: The generated description for the provided image.
text.example: A meticulously illustrated cat with striped patterns, sitting upright. The cat's eyes are a captivating shade of yellow, and it appears to be gazing intently at something. The background consists of abstract, swirling patterns in shades of black, white, and beige, creating an almost fluid or wavy appearance. The cat is positioned in the foreground, with the background elements fading into the distance, giving a sense of depth to the image.
text.title: text
